mapper.update:
update SCP_WF_PROC_DELEGATE
PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_LICENSOR = #{procLicensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_LICENSOR_ROLE = #{procLicensorRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_MANDATARY = #{procMandatary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROC_LICENSE_TIME = #{procLicenseTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROC_CANCEL_TIME = #{procCancelTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = #{procLicenseIsvalid,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SCP_WF_PROC_DELEGATE set PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_LICENSOR = #{procLicensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_LICENSOR_ROLE = #{procLicensorRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_MANDATARY = #{procMandatary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROC_LICENSE_TIME = #{procLicenseTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROC_CANCEL_TIME = #{procCancelTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = #{procLicenseIsvalid,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT delegate.PROC_INST_ID procInstId, delegate.PROC_LICENSOR procLicensor, delegate.PROC_LICENSOR_ROLE procLicensorRole FROM SCP_WF_PROC_DELEGATE delegate WHERE delegate.PROC_INST_ID = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delegate.PROC_MANDATARY = #{mandatary,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND delegate.PROC_LICENSE_ISVALID = '1'
